title: The Image Problem
subtitle: It was rumored that Tashvin Malik's lawyers (and a host from MSNBC) were frustrated by the publication of photographs of her face because it was offensive to Muslims.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A lawyer for Tashvin Malik asked the media not to show her face because it was offensive to Muslims, and the host company, Melissa Harris Perry, criticized the New York Times for publishing these photographs.
